verbose_text: Moreover, NOD2 and ATG16L1 both colocalized at bacterial entry sites, and the Nod2 polymorphism L1007insC, which is strongly associated with CD, failed to induce bacterial autophagy as ATG16L1 did not localize to the plasma membrane [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Nod2 polymorphism L1007insC, which is strongly associated with CD, failed to induce bacterial autophagy
